overview: Ahmed El-Prince, a simple employee, falls in love with one of his female colleagues, and they agree to marry, but he faces great financial problems. He tries to work in more than one job in order to generate income for him, including trading in bags and smuggling clothes, but he fails. He seeks help from his rich aunt Nazira but she refuses to help him. He believes that his inheritance from Nazira after her death is the perfect solution to all his problems, so he plans for it.
title: The solution is called Nazira
